meanings.definition: Miswrit (verb): past tense of miswrite, to write or spell incorrectly.
meanings.sent1: She miswrit her name on the test and got a lower grade.
meanings.sent2: He miswrit the address on the envelope and it got returned.
meanings.sent3: The miswrit recipe made the cake taste like soap.
meanings.sent4: His miswrit directions led us to a dead end.
meanings.sent5: The miswrit sign caused confusion among the visitors.

meanings.sent1: The miswrit letter had many spelling mistakes.
meanings.sent2: She received a miswrit invitation with the wrong date.
meanings.sent3: The miswrit note made everyone laugh at the party.
meanings.sent5: The miswrit label caused confusion among the students.
